mapper.select: SELECT a.order_no, a.client_code, c.client_name, a.order_date, a.employee_code, d.name, b.item_code, b.item_name, b.quantity, e.price, ( b.quantity * e.supply_price ) supply_price, ( b.quantity * e.vat) vat FROM orders a INNER JOIN order_item b ON a.order_no = b.order_no JOIN client c ON a.client_code = c.client_code JOIN employees d ON a.employee_code = d.employee_code JOIN contract_item e ON b.item_code = e.item_code
